title: MFW the middle lane is blamed for feeding.

replies.body:
SALTY STORY TIME:

Once upon a time playing with my best friend, who is also a giant salt mine, I was a 0/5 morgana. He was a 1/6 Poppy. We had a 0/7 Jinx and a 2/3 or something ekko mid. There was also a 6/1 Blitzcrank Jungle.

Who did he blame?

I'll let you guess.

He clearly blamed the ekko for stealing two kills.

I'll show myself out now.

SALTY STORY TIME:

One morning. I ate eggs.

...

... that was it. What? I put salt on them. It counts.

Had pretty much the opposite where I was against an Akali, she killed me once early, then we went even in lane, I pushed her back to base, MIA'd her and she went bot and picked up a triple.  "WTF ZED WHERE'S THE MIA" - what do you say at that point?  I mentioned she based after a trade, and I pinged MIA.... "THEN YOU SHOULD BE FOLLOWING HER" .... follow her back to base?  Unwarded bot lane dies... suddenly mids fault.  She proceeded to do this every time either myself or her was out of lane, she like a good laner would shove, or I would shove and then aid other lanes... at the end of the game our bot lane support "Report Zed feeder"... Apparently my laner roaming and me not guessing which way they are going to go meant I was "feeding".
That's why I made a habit of putting my cursor on top of my teammates whenever I ping. If they don't see a giant exclamation point in front of them it ain't my fault

> [{quoted}](name=Epic Murph,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3KvGoo6L,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-08T23:33:05.351+0000)
>
> That's why I made a habit of putting my cursor on top of my teammates whenever I ping. If they don't see a giant exclamation point in front of them it ain't my fault

Yeah, I bet that raging Jinx that just got pwn'd by Akali will think the same xD

Here's how I'd go about this situation.
"Look at the chat, you see that little *Champion you're playing* signaled enemies are missing?"
If they proceed to be a dumbass.
"Well, next I'll try to follow her into the enemy base and camp the fountain. That good with you?"

I've been in the spot Zed was in many times

Edit: the story was I was playing viegar mid against a graves, about seven minutes into the game I back to buy items, and while walking back to lane I get this: enemy quadrakill, and graves is now 4/0

Anyone can be blamed for feeding! At any time! 

People's blindness know no bounds

i once saw someone 0/3,and my team said he was feeding.

wot
Was it a Team Builder game? Because every time I play Team Builder as Ahri I get matched against a Zed.
well if your opponent laner is taking kills somewhere else or you phreaking take his turrets till you reach the bastard's nexus or better you follow and rekt the hell outta him
I main support so you can bet murder was on my mind when a *TEEMO SUPPORT* flamed me (Ahri mid) for feeding Kat, when at that point I only had one death, and it was from their jungler.
